titleStmt.title: Frank Krebs and Pat Daughtery v. King County. Commitment of Frank Krebs

bibl.title: Frank Krebs and Pat Daughtery v. King County. Commitment of Frank Krebs
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: United States of America. Territory of Washington, County of King, ss. In Justice's Court, Seattle Precinct, King County, W.T., before JOHN F. MILLER, J.P. Territory of Washington, Plaintiff, vs. Frank Krebs Defendant, To Charles Robinson Constable + John H McGraw SHeriff King Co. and the keeper of the jail of said King County WHEREAS, at a Justice's Court held at my office, in said county for the trial of Frank Krebs for the offense hereinafter stated, the said Frank Krebs was convicted of having, on the 7th day of October 1889, in said county, committed the misdemeanor of assault. and upon conviction, the said Court did adjudge and determine that said Frank Krebs should pay a fine of Ten 10.00 dollars, and $22.95 dollars costs, and stand committed days or until the same be paid: and, whereas, the said Frank Krebs has nade default in the payment of the same. Therefore, you, the said Constable are hereby commanded in the name of the United States forthwith to convery and deliver the said Frank Krebs to the said keeper; and, you the said keeper, are herevy commanded to receive the said Frank Krebs into your custody in said jail, and him there keep at hard labor for the space of 16 days, unless said fine and costs be sooner paid, or he shall thence be discharged by due course of law. Dated this 10th day of October 1889 John F. Miller Justice of the Peace.
Copy Commitment. Territory of Washington vs. Frank Krebs 16 da.
